content: On July 10, Zhangjiakou City, Hebei Province. Villagers in Shiyaogou Village reported that the photovoltaic engineering team destroyed farmland and trees during construction and refused to compensate. The villagers tried to stop the construction team and were forcibly carried away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens posted online that the Hangzhou East Station, which was just built 11 years ago, has a platform settlement problem. The pictures show that the platform of Hangzhou East Station has a significant drop, and the drop of some doors exceeds 30 centimeters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 11, the water situation in Dianjiang County, Chongqing. A disaster victim said, "It rained heavily last night, and it became like this overnight. I haven't seen it in decades." According to reports, as of 13:50 today, 4 people in Dianjiang County died due to geological disasters and 2 people drowned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 9, Jinan, Shandong. Netizens posted a video saying that the 4-year-old anti-cancer angel "Little Apple" passed away. The mother held a farewell ceremony for the child and contacted the funeral home hoping to decorate the mourning hall with flower baskets for the child. In the end, there were only 8 flower baskets and a few pots of fresh flowers in the mourning hall, and the fee was 13,800 yuan! 
On July 10, the official announcement: Our bureau has set up an investigation team to conduct a serious investigation into the problems reflected on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of July 10, a junior high school in Longgang District, Shenzhen, released a "volunteer recruitment" notice in the teacher group, hoping that teachers would actively sign up to look after the children of cadres and staff in the summer vacation.
The street office responded: The principle is voluntary, not only the children of cadres are taken care of, but also those from the public.

name: 李老师不是你老师

content: July 10, Foshan, Guangdong. Video shows that the glass of the Agricultural Bank of China in Baini Town was apparently smashed by someone. The reason is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guilin, Guangxi, some netizens posted on social media platforms, reflecting the situation that the performance bonus of Guilin's public servants could not be paid. Netizens said, "It's another day with only basic salary, 30% of the salary is not paid, most of the performance bonuses of Guilin's public servants have not been paid for 22 years, and no performance bonuses have been paid for 23 to 24 years."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on July 11, a Chinese female tourist went missing after going into the sea at a beach in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan on the evening of the 8th. She was found after drifting for a day and a night.
However, in the report, the Chinese official media mosaiced the sentence in the woman's post asking for help: "We called the embassy in Japan but the number was not in service, and no one answered the email."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 9, Motherland Magazine: It is urgent to expose the fallacy of pessimistic views on China's economy and to clean up and punish those who pessimistic views.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, Zhangjiakou, Hebei Province is forcibly recruiting non-staff teachers to serve as auxiliary police.
The notice requires that all non-staff personnel who meet the requirements must sign up, and 30 people will be selected to work in the detention base to guard the detained personnel.
Units that fail to report will have their financial allocations for non-staff personnel cancelled, and their labor relations will be terminated after their individual contracts expire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, an ICBC employee posted a message on the ICBC internal forum titled "Profits belong to the company, but your body belongs to you", expressing the employee's strong dissatisfaction with the overtime culture and the exploitation of employees. In the post, the author first pointed out that employees are not doctors who save lives or soldiers who rescue people in disasters, and there is no need to sacrifice their health for the benefit of the company. He emphasized that customers do not care about the speed or version number of product iterations; they only care about

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, Zhangjiakou, Hebei Province is forcibly recruiting non-staff teachers to serve as auxiliary police.
The notice requires that all non-staff personnel who meet the requirements must register, and 30 people will be selected to work in the detention base to guard and detain personnel.
Units that fail to report will have their financial allocations for non-staff personnel cancelled, and their labor relations will be terminated after the expiration of their individual contracts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in the recruitment examination for the Class A male dormitory counselor position of Harbin University of Science and Technology, the written test score of a candidate was corrected from 47 points to 85 points, becoming the first in the written test for the corresponding position and attracting attention.
On July 8, the school's official website issued a notice: After review by external experts, the score of one candidate was incorrectly checked, and his written test score was corrected from 47 points to 85 points (including policy-based bonus points)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10 (Release), Wenzhou, Zhejiang. Citizens greeted the leader who was walking in front, but the leader ignored them. Later, some netizens pointed out that this was Zhang Benfeng, the secretary of the Cangnan County Party Committee.

On July 11, the detection of carcinogens in edible oil imported from Japan became a hot topic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lao Dongyan, a professor of criminal law at Tsinghua University, said:
Whether the government regulatory authorities and the management of the companies involved have neglected their duties is the core of the whole incident.
If only the transport personnel and the directly responsible personnel are punished in the end, it is conceivable that the industry chaos of mixed edible oil transportation will not be effectively punished.

content: It was reported online that on July 5, a primary school student in Xindi Village, Zhanjiang, Guangdong stabbed his grandfather with a knife while his grandfather was sleeping because his grandfather refused to recharge his game money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 8, Henan. The residents of the southeastern Henan High-tech Zone said that their houses were demolished last year, but this year's resettlement fees have been in arrears, so they came to the street office to seek justice. "We have run countless times, but they still haven't solved our problem."
Another netizen from Jiangsu said that their house has been demolished for nearly ten years, and they have not received the resettlement fees.
